name: Just Hatched "Chick Wagon" Layette Set
description:
Just hatched by our fabulously creative "peeps" , this whimsical "Chick Wagon" pulls a peck of eggs-ceptional baby essentials right to the lucky (or, should we say "clucky?") mom-to-be! She'll chirp with delight when she sees some of the items accented with a precious baby chick tweeting different delightful messages and, oh, the booties that look like baby chick feet! An eggs-traordinary gift for a boy or a girl! Features and facts:

-Seven-piece layette set includes hooded blanket, bodysuit, bib, hat, booties, plush chick rattle and adorable "chick wagon" 
-Layette items are white with bright yellow trim and adorable "chick" appliqu√©s with tweet sayings 
-Made from machine-washable, 100% cotton 
-Layette set is presented in a sheer-white organza bag with white-satin drawstring 
-Wood "chick" wagon is shaped like a baby chick hatching from its shell, in white and pastels of yellow and green, with bright-orange wheels 
-Wagon measures approximately 14" h x 9" w x 11" d

name: Bunch O' Bloomers
description:
Please pick the flowers! When you do, you can give them to the new best girl in your life. She'll look absolutely adorable with these blooming bloomers on her bum! With a beautiful gift box and three flowery bloomers inside, Oh! Baby! has everything covered! Features and facts:

-Adorably designed "flower box" contains three pairs of bloomers, each with a colorful, fun flower on the bum 
-Bloomers with lilac flower and gold center are white with big, pink polka dots; bloomers with pale-orange flower and pink center have bright yellow-and- white stripes; bloomers with white flower and gold center are soft green with tiny white polka dots 
-Made of machine-washable, 100% cotton 
-Clever gift presentation has the three flowers blooming from the white "flower-box" gift box with lilac polka dots on the lid and lilac stripes on the bottom, all accented with a sage-green satin ribbon 
-Size 0-6 months

name: "Sweet Tee" Golf Layette Set
description:
Maybe you should give the new mom and dad two of these uncommonly cute "Sweet Tee" Golf Layette Sets in case baby boy gets a hole in one! Can you imagine a more winning baby gift for the golf-obsessed mom and dad? Their little duffer will be the cutest kid in the clubhouse! Features and facts:

-Sporty golf layette set includes soft green-and-beige argyle-print bodysuit with white sleeves, white back and bottom and beige trim and secure snap closure, matching argyle tam with sky-blue pom-pom accent and white booties with green trim and sky-blue pom poms 
-Made of machine-washable, 100% cotton 
-Cute mini-golf-cart gift box with same green, blue beige and white color scheme has clear windows that showcase the layette and a hole in the top where the tam's pom pom pops through 
-Size 0-6 months

name: "Let the Fin Begin" Terry Shark Robe
description:
Mom and Dad are going fall for this terry-ific sea-inspired robe--hook, line and little stinker! After a refreshing bath time for baby, they'll want to wrap their wiggly, wet one in something cozy, absorbent and cute. Oh! Baby's Terry Shark Robe is reel-y fun and oh, so fin! Features and facts:

-Sea-blue terry robe with white cuffs, two terry ties in front, a hood with smiling, white shark's teeth, appliqued black eyes and a dorsal fin accent 
-Bottom of robe resembles a shark's tail 
-Machine-wash and dry (low)
-Size 0-6 months

name: "Jakka the Giraffe" Plush Rattle
description:
Standing tall in a safari-themed gift box, Jakka the Giraffe has all the plushness and playfulness you could ask for in a cuddle-soft baby gift! Intriguing textures and sounds, like the crinkle leaf, the satin trim and the rattle, will captivate the senses of a baby new to the world! Features and facts:

-Plush, beautifully detailed lovie in giraffe print with giraffe's head, front legs holding a sound-making, green crinkle leaf and tail on the back 
-Other features include baby-safe embroidered eyes, giraffe horns, cream-colored satin trim, a decorative leaf applique and embroidered accents along the bottom of the lovie 
-Polyester lovie can be surface-washed 
-Jakka measures 15" tall 
-Gift box measures 12" h x 6 1/2" w x 3 1/4" d
